article: There were two lovers. The man was _ cowardly that he always let the girlfriend try first everything _ they would do. His girlfriend was not so _ with that. Once they went out to sea. After returning , their boat was _ by the storm. Luckily, the girlfriend held a _ to save their lives. The girlfriend asked her boyfriend, "Do you _ ?" The boyfriend took out a fruit knife and said, "Yes, but if any shark comes I can deal with it with this." His girlfriend only shook her head with a cold smile. Soon a great number of people on a _ found them. Suddenly a group of sharks appeared. His girlfriend cried out , "Let's swim hard together and we'll be all right." But her boyfriend suddenly pushed the girl into the sea, held the wood and shouted to the ship by himself, "Let me try _ this time!" _ ,his girlfriend looked at her boyfriend. The sharks were drawing near, but they were not interested in the girl and swam _ to the boy. When he was torn and bitten fiercely by the sharks, the boyfriend _ shouted to his girlfriend, " I love you!" The girl was saved. All the people on the deck were standing in silence. The captain sat beside the girl and said, "Miss, he is the _ man I have _ seen. Let's pray for him." "No! He is a _ , "said the girl coldly. "How could you say like this? I have just been watching you _ the telescope . I saw clearly he _ his wrist with the knife after pushing you away. The sharks are very sensitive to the _ . If he hadn't done this to _ time. I'm afraid you would never appear on this ship..."
